DataElement.preferredName: Past Integer::6 Month Abdominal Cramp Lower Back Pain Discomfort Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify the occurence of abdominal cramping or lower back pain associated with a menstrual cycle in the past six months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past Integer::6 Month Abdominal Cramp Lower Back Pain Discomfort Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::6_One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._An involuntary muscular contraction involving a muscle of the abdomen or of a hollow organ within the abdomen._A sensation of discomfort emanating from the lower back._A feeling of mental or physical uneasiness, pain, or distress.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Past Integer::6 Month Abdominal Cramp Lower Back Pain Discomfort
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part.::6:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:No value exists.:Acute or chronic pain in the lumbar or sacral regions, which may be associated with musculo-ligamentous SPRAINS AND STRAINS; INTERVERTEBRAL DISK DISPLACEMENT; and other conditions.:No Value Exists

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
An involuntary muscular contraction involving a muscle of the abdomen or of a hollow organ within the abdomen.
A sensation of discomfort emanating from the lower back.
A feeling of mental or physical uneasiness, pain, or distress.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
